parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The time is displayed in UTC.

parameters.name: LookupAttributes
parameters.description: The attributes used for advanced search.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request. You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. The time is displayed in UTC.
